segments.text: I ’ m going to Bihai park . Is this the right bus please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . you ’ re going the wrong way . You wanna 103 from the Beijing zoo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how can I get it , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You get off at the next stop , cross the street and you will find the stop not far on the right hand side .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: could I have a transfer , please ?
segments.speaker: S1
